modName: Avatar-NaVi Race and Neytiri NaVi Follower
summary: Na\'Vi Race made by Den 987 ! My creation is only the follower (Neytiri) situated at south entrance of Riverwood next to the sort of camp before entering the village! She is Mainly an archer so it respect the Avatar Bow focused for this race!
descriptionHtml:
Sorry for not saying but Na\'vi race CCBE is required from Den987!
If it asks you to overwrite the NaviRace.esp do not overwrite it!
Update 1.1:
-Modification to her class \'Na\'Vi Warrior\'
- + 250 health , +200 magicka, +250 stamina!
- Speed 100 ----> 125
- New Warpaint on the right of her face.


Na\'Vi Race made by Den 987 ! My creation is only the follower situated at south entrance of Riverwood next to the sort of camp before entering the village! She is Mainly an archer so it respect the Avatar Bow focused for this race! 
-The original mod from Den987 is here :
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33590/
only if you don\'t want the follower!

Neytiri:
-Daedric Bow 
-2 Daedric Daggers 
-250 Daedric Arrows
-Hunter Armour
-3 Torch

Spells:
-Healing 
- Fast Healing
-Paralyze

If there is a problem with her height report it so i can taker her a but down!
And give me some feedback ! Thanks a lot for your help guys!
:D

SHE IS MARRIAGEABLE!

MY NEXT PROJECT IS MUCH BIGGER , I AM GOING TO TRANSFORM ALL THE DRAGONS INTO \' THE SHADOW \' IN AVATAR ( THERE WILL BE DIFFERENT COLORS ) . THANKS!
author: Den987 and MrFrenziedGamer
